"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f921946368723893500100#post_53f921946368723893500100
As much as I like Ultraman, I doubt that he would be able to do the job, Seeing how Zetton managed to nearly kill him. (He is one of the most powerful monster in the Ultraverse, But He's about King Ghidorah tier at the most)

Zoffy, Taro, And Post series Leo would have the best chances of taking him down. (Who aren't OP like Zero and King)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f922a763687208c9020000#post_53f922a763687208c9020000

Ultraman vs Monster X will be an epic fight.

"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f924c66368724f4bc70000#post_53f924c66368724f4bc70000
With the exception of Seven, They all have three minutes.

I say Leo and Taro would have a better chance because Taro knows all of the techniques of his brothers. (Other than Leo.) And Leo is easily the strongest of all the Ultras that aren't OP and He's a master at Melee combat.
